modName: Music and Blade replacer - Compliment to the Bankai mod
summary: This if for the Bankai mod. This replaces the combat music 3 and ebony blade to a more suitable music and blade. Credit goes to:  http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=11754
descriptionHtml:
This if for the Bankai mod:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12333

This replaces the music that plays when the ring is equiped and ebony blade to a more suitable music and blade. 

Credit goes to:  http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=11754

The song: number one (bleach ost)
The sword: tensa zangetsu
author: not me
